HE WILL ALSO STOP RANIL FROM CERTAIN IDEAS TO COVER gota and mahindas wife, kids and his brothers and mahinda too along with thise currupted ministers...   THE CURSE IS ON THEM ALL FRON POHOTUWA....

comments.comment:
Are you a Buddhist monk or a  ‚Äú  inhuman ‚Äú in robes ?
According to Lord Buddha ‚Äòs teachings Buddhists  DONT ridicule others at all let alone laugh at them publicly like you!  
You are a person who‚Äôs taking away votes from Sajith , because when someone makes utterances like that we, though not fans of Gotabhaya,  feel for him and his brother!!
One day you will grow old and ‚Äú nohaki ‚Äú  I.e. decay like Mahinda and ALL of us. You are not immortal. 
So please behave like a true Buddha puthra and not like ‚ÄúMaara ‚Äú or devil reincarnate!!!
